title: I like many... have reached the conclusion that....
body:
you need to hard carry every game to climb. I have the potential to do so... now GD... tell me..

who do I master to hard carry games? adc can't stop missing cs and getting caught out, jungle is a joke.. mid feeds all day, top lets nasus feed his Q for free all dayand just hangs back. now what? who do i play, when my entire team is clearly not meant to win the game? they get out played, out cs'd and make terrible decisions. every game. i am on the other side maybe 2/10 games.... so what do I do to hard carry? because I am pretty sick of losing games.... 

I could rant more, but won't. I know I am individually better than 80-90% of the enemy and my own team... it isn't hard, my mmr is shot and i'm fighting silver Vs and as low as bronze 3..... 

what do I do?
